message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase a valuable product. I believe it has the potential to be highly beneficial to your business. While I can't disclose specifics without a confidentiality agreement, I'm confident it's worth significantly more than $1200000.  To demonstrate my belief in the product's value, I'm offering it to you at a price of $1500000. This is a substantial discount from what I believe it's truly worth. Let me know if you're interested in learning more.
